page.title: 01LANDSCAPE FERNDOWN GENERAL
page.content: {Ferndown}is a rapidly developing, mainly{residential district}situated near the south coast and{Bournemouth, a popular holiday resort. The main A31 passes through the town,connecting the M3 and M27 to the coast with{Poole, and{Swanage}to the west.{Ferndown}is one of the biggest towns in the area. There is not much need to go into the surrounding towns, as Ferndown offers you a wide choice of shops and services. If you wanted to get out of the town for a few hours, there are frequent buses to Bournemouth, Poole, Ringwood, Southampton, Salisbury and Wimborne, or to any of the nearby country villages. In order to remove heavy traffic from the centre of the town, a new{bypass is already being built and will be completed in two years.
